articles.description: Former Aussie captain Mark Taylor has weighed in on the tumultuous relationship shared between former teammates Shane Warne ad Steve Waugh.
articles.content:
Former captain Mark Taylor has weighed in on the bitter relationship between Shane Warne and Steve Waugh after they again traded barbs.
Warne and Waugh havent seen eye-to-eye for a number of years, … [+3137 chars]

articles.title: Cheika: I should’ve quit before the World Cup - The Roar
articles.description: Former coach Michael Cheika says he should have walked away from the Wallabies in early 2019 after Rugby Australia showed “they didn’t trust me any more”. Cheika has said he should have quit when RA brought in Scott Johnson as director of rugby and introduced…

articles.author: Stephen Brassel
articles.title: Zac Purton involved in pre-race incident then wins Group I - Racenet
articles.description: Zac Purton escaped injury after being flipped out the back of the barriers in the seventh race at Sha Tin on Sunday before bouncing back to win the Group I Standard Chartered Chater Cup on Exultant just 30 minutes later.
